CAP - io.dimeformat.enums.Claim
Capability - Describes the capabilities, or usages/constrains, of an item (Identity, Identity Issuing Request, Key).
CapabilityException - Exception in io.dimeformat.exceptions
Exception that is thrown if there is any problems with capabilities for a DiME item.

clear() - Method in class io.dimeformat.keyring.KeyRing
Removes all keys and identities in the key ring.
CNM - io.dimeformat.enums.Claim
Common Name - A common name, or alias, for the item, may be used to simplify manual identification of items (All).

Manager of cryptographic suites and operations.
